itunes:title: Human Events Daily - Oct 7 2021 - A Christian Response to the Jab testing on Aborted Fetuses
title: Human Events Daily - Oct 7 2021 - A Christian Response to the Jab testing on Aborted Fetuses
description:
If aborted fetuses aren’t people, why are they used for medical testing? Today I address the abortion testing of medicine, and the way forward for Christians and the pro-life movement, watch Jake Tapper break down as Pres. Biden polls sink, and tens of thousands of Haitians are preparing a caravan in Columbia right now.


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
content:encoded:
